segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused, almost oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the sink is overflowing, water spilling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a puddle, and her foot is already in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she doesn't notice the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, two children are trying to get cookies from a jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of dread, hoping he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are trying to be quiet and not get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels tense, like something is about to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
